channel.title: *Important* Need Help with this ASAP *Important*
channel.description:
Client Base im using: Bluurs. The problem I am facing is: When I instert a model such as Dragon Claws, or such. & Insert the class8 code.
I compile, run, etc.
Then when I Go onto my server and spawn like ::pickup 8002 for claws. They show up as something really odd: ---------------------- Here is a pictures
[IMG]http://img132.imageshack.us/img132/5425/clientglitch.jpg[/img]
Please help, I have tryed alot of things .

item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

Did you type add model ***** in your server, than restarted the client? If you did that than also try.

  1. Try using a different model.

  2. Maybe changing the ints?
